duas.title: Dua for Sick Person
duas.arabic: أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، اشْفِ وَأَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
duas.translation: Remove the affliction, O Lord of mankind, and heal. You are the Healer. There is no healing but Yours, a healing that leaves no illness behind.
